alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:20PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Musselshell, northeastern Yellowstone, northern Rosebud and northwestern Treasure Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 519 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Melstone to 14 miles southeast of Roundup. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Melstone and Musselshell. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Treasure
